thread.title: Get £500 off a brand new car, this Saturday only
thread.title_full: Get £500 off a brand new car, this Saturday only

author: ddeibe
title: Get £500 off a brand new car, this Saturday only
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THIS Saturday, 4th February, for one day only, Suzuki are offering £500 off any car in their range* and everyone is invited. Suzuki 3 The Ignis is the perfect city car. Get £500 off this Saturday 
From the adventurous Ignis to the seriously stylish Vitara, there are plenty to choose from. All you need to do is head to your local Suzuki dealership and you’ll get £500 a brand new car. Suzuki 3 Fancy a Suzuki Vitara? Get £500 this Saturday! 
There’s no catch – just a great discount. For full Ts & Cs and to find your nearest dealer head here . Suzuki 3 The Suzuki Swift Sport is the hottest hatch on the road. Get £500 this Saturday 
*The £500 discount applies to current, unregistered stock at participating UK dealers. 4 Feb 2017 only. Private customers. UK 18+. Subject to availability based on current stock. Terms and exclusions apply.
